name: rardir
author: Max Zakharzhevskiy
description: Utility to pack meta data inside specified folders.

scripts.ma: pnpm build && pkg -t node18-win-x64 -o rardirj dist/index.js
scripts.makebin: pnpm build && pkg -t host -o rardirj dist/index.js
scripts.exe3: pnpm build && nexe -t host -o rardirj2 dist/index.js --build
scripts.exe4: pnpm build && nexe -t host -o rardirj2 dist/index.js
scripts.exe5: pnpm build && nexe -t host -o rardirj2 dist/index.js
scripts.exe6: pnpm build && nexe -t node18-win-x64 -o rardir7 all.js
